issue.title: c.ai

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://c.ai](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fc.ai) ### Comment > It's not really just this app. It's others, but this is the only one which name is a url. > Either way. Apps are being used as normal. Most ads are now bypassing the ad blocker. Even apps that haven't been updated for patches like this. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/1qn9x9apfr1coc8g8cwg8o4wccsgoc0b3ww9nd6fgo.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12 System version: | `Android 14` Browser: | Apps License type: | free AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12&system_version=Android+14&browser=other&browser_detail=Apps&filters=208.11.2.101&dns_servers=System&userscripts=https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.meta.js&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&license_type=free)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions

issue.title: i.360.cn
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://i.360.cn/login/?src=pcw_home&destUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.360.cn%2F](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.360.cn%2Flogin%2F%3Fsrc%3Dpcw_home%26destUrl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.360.cn%252F) ### Comment > https://i.360.cn/login/?src=pcw_home&destUrl=https://www.360.cn/ 无法正常登录，包括360 Wargaming Game Center软件中，账号密码登录时，无法弹出图形验证码。但是退出adguard后，均恢复正常 ``` Username: wjdcrw@gmail.com ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/o8yiumptapcs08ckgcwgowsoskww8wwtllr8os8olw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/nnb2nu4d4ogs4ssg4o8swwoocwsocgwlx7nti1iry8.png?nc=1)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://i.360.cn/login/?src=pcw_home&destUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.360.cn%2F](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.360.cn%2Flogin%2F%3Fsrc%3Dpcw_home%26destUrl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.360.cn%252F) ### Comment > https://i.360.cn/login/?src=pcw_home&destUrl=https://www.360.cn/ 无法正常登录，包括360 Wargaming Game Center软件中，账号密码登录时，无法弹出图形验证码。但是退出adguard后，均恢复正常 ``` Username: wjdcrw@gmail.com ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/o8yiumptapcs08ckgcwgowsoskww8wwtllr8os8olw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/nnb2nu4d4ogs4ssg4o8swwoocwsocgwlx7nti1iry8.png?nc=1)

filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.360.cn/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.360.cn%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.info/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.0+%285225%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&browser=edge&filters=2.3.4.224&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=1.15%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fwww.360.cn%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)
